column6: It may happen in Vegas, but it's very likely not going to stay there as X-Factor in general--and Longshot in particular-- are unleashed on the Las Vegas strip, determined to face down the goddess of death in her lair and save a very unusual client... Rated T  ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Peter David | penciller:EMANUELA LUPACCHINO | penciller:David Yardin
